metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5819 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: An error within the "parse_sinar_ia()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp)within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 can be exploited to exhaustavailable CPU resources.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
